BRAZIL-SOUTHEAST COAST.
1. SEISMIC SURVEY IN PROGRESS UNTIL 140159Z JUN BY
   M/V OCEANIC CHAMPION TOWING 12 FIVE MILE
   LONG CABLES IN AREA BOUND BY
   20-06.85S 038-14.85W, 21-21.13S 038-14.40W,
   21-20.50S 039-11.82W, 21-19.03S 039-31.55W,
   20-09.92S 039-31.85W, 20-03.40S 039-22.20W,
   20-03.32S 038-20.17W.
   SEVEN MILE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 1421/14.
3. CANCEL THIS MSG 140259Z JUN 14.
